alert.note: Alert for Huntingdon; Mifflin; Northern Centre; Southern Centre (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 10:25PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN HUNTINGDON...CENTRAL MIFFLIN AND SOUTHERN CENTRE COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM EDT... At 1025 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tyrone to 10 miles southwest of Lewistown. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... State College, Lewistown, Huntingdon, Bellefonte, Park Forest Village, Boalsburg, Pleasant Gap, Stormstown, Lemont, Burnham, Zion, Belleville, Houserville, Warriors Mark, Pine Grove Mills, Milroy, Highland Park, Centre Hall, Milesburg and Yeagertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Huntingdon; Mifflin; Northern Centre; Southern Centre
